body.name: Hiseeu 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera Without WiFi, 2K HD Color Night Vision Outdoor Camera Wireless Solar Powered, 2-Way Talk, SIM Card & 128GB SD Card Included
deliveryMessages: Delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 43 mins
features: Wire-Free, Power-Full Security: Say goodbye to the limitations of Wi-Fi and power outlets. Our cutting-edge 4G LTE cellular security camera operates seamlessly without the need for Wi-Fi, liberating you from connectivity constraints. Plus, enjoy the freedom of a high-capacity battery and solar powered, ensuring uninterrupted surveillance even in areas with no electric power.

Intelligent Alerts & 2K Color Night Vision: SIM card camera experience unrivaled security with a panoramic 360° Field of View, eliminating blind spots. Smart PIR Motion Detection ensures instant alerts for detected movement, keeping you in control. Enhance your nighttime surveillance with 2K Color Night Vision, delivering vivid and detailed imagery even in low-light conditions.

Unrivaled Connectivity: Our off grid security camera seamlessly links to Verizon, T-Mobile, and AT&T's 4G networks, offering comprehensive coverage. The package includes a prepaid 4G LTE SIM card with 300MB free for immediate testing. Flexible 4G subscription plans start at just $14.9 per month, catering to your connectivity needs on a budget. Stay connected affordably without compromising security.

Remote Access & Two-Way Talk: Hiseeu 4G LTE cellular security camera, via the UBox app, stay connected to your security system anytime, anywhere with easy Remote Access. Through a 4G network and 4x digital zoom, even if you are out of farm, jobsite, you can remotely access this cellular camera via your phone to have a real-time full view of your property.

Peace of Mind, Beyond Purchase: Our 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera adapts to homes, barn, farm and remote locations. From construction sites to secluded property, it ensures reliable surveillance. Our commitment includes prompt customer support, user-friendly guides, and a warranty, ensuring you have a trusted partner in safeguarding what matters most.
body.description: Hiseeu 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera Without WiFi, 2K HD Color Night Vision Outdoor Camera Wireless Solar Powered, 2-Way Talk, SIM Card & 128GB SD Card Included
